question: What are 6 Points in Jamaat?
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamualaykum I have set myself a time to go to Jamaat (going to masjids, preaching, learning Islam etc), unfortunately I have forgotten some basic points, please help. Please tell me what the 6 points are for when going to jamaat, (a certain 6 points are recited) in detail so I understand. And what main surahs/ayats of the Quran need to be read in the gathering? Please also give me other information that I will need. Jazakallah
ANSWER


Share:
In brief, the six points are: a) Imaan, b) Salaat, c) Ilm (knowledge) and Dhikr, d) Ikraam (honouring a Muslim), e) Ikhlaas (sincerity), f) Da?awah (spending time).

They revise the last 10 surahs of the Qur?aan from Surah feel.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
